data.actual_result: It's a long URL leading to the actual image, but it's not actually the original imgur link
data.expected_result: It should be the imgur link
data.short_description: When right clicking on an image then copy link, it won't copy the actual image link, instead it will copy a long URL which links to the same image, but it's a long weird URL
data.steps_to_repro: - Post an image in Discord that's linked from an another image host such as imgur - Right click on the image then copy link - Observe the link
